scripts.deployDev: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.partial.js -o && firebase deploy --only hosting:dev,hosting:local
scripts.deployProd: ng build --prod --aot --extra-webpack-config webpack.partial.js -o && firebase deploy --only hosting:prod
scripts.deployDev3: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.partial.js -o && firebase deploy --only hosting:dev3,hosting:local3
scripts.deployDev4: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.partial.js -o && firebase deploy --only hosting:dev4,hosting:local4
scripts.deployRelease: ng build --prod --aot --extra-webpack-config webpack.partial.js -o && firebase deploy --only hosting:release,hosting:release-local
scripts.sdk:fetch: npm run sdk:schema:download && openapi-generator generate -i ./swagger.json -g typescript-fetch -o ./sdk-fetch/
scripts.sdk:axios: npm run sdk:schema:download && openapi-generator generate -i ./swagger.json -g typescript-axios -o ./sdk-axios/
